data.text: Need Bicycle Chamois with Minimal Pads

In search of, cycling chamois with minimal padding (NOT your used onesüòú) These in the pic were bought many many years ago and I can't seem to find anything similar that are reasonably priced (read under $40). Most brands seem to favor the oversized pads that make me feel like I'm wearing a wet diaper by the rides end. I am currently breaking in a Brooks Professional, notorious for taking a while, and I find the thick padding also does not let my sit bones find their ideal spot on the saddle. Any suggestions are helpful aside from those involving way overpriced offerings which imo are mostly selling their name and not anything of a much better quality to justify the price. But that's just me. What ya got !?
DHB seems to have thin pads. I personally like the Fox pads / shorts combo.
